items.sentence: If you live near water, you should teach your children to swim.
Tom tried to convince Mary not to do that, but he was unable to.
Tom tried to remember the last time he had drunk wine with Mary.
Tom turned on the TV, stretched out on the bed, and fell asleep.
Tom used the new knife Mary had given him to cut the vegetables.
I had to catch the first train this morning to get here in time.
I have no doubt in my mind that Tom will show up at the auction.
I heard that Tom is planning to take Mary out to dinner tonight.
The medic ripped open Tom\'s shirt and took a look at the wound.
The police found Tom\'s body in a shallow grave behind the barn.
